mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.zjname AS "zjname", a.investtype AS "investtype", a.investprop AS "investprop", a.investamt AS "investamt", a.pkinvestdis AS "fea_investdis.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.jsamt AS "jsamt", a.ldamt AS "ldamt"
LEFT JOIN fea_investdis b ON b.id = a.pkinvestdis
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_investdis_b( id, zjname, investtype, investprop, investamt, pkinvestdis, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, jsamt, ldamt ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{zjname}, #{investtype}, #{investprop}, #{investamt}, #{fea_investdis.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{jsamt}, #{ldamt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_investdis_b SET zjname = #{zjname}, investtype = #{investtype}, investprop = #{investprop}, investamt = #{investamt}, pkinvestdis = #{fea_investdis.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, jsamt = #{jsamt}, ldamt = #{ldamt} WHERE id = #{id}
